original_text: I continued to try to learn more and more. But I could not find the answers. Among one thousand people, I found one good man. But among them all, I did not find a good woman. I continued to try to learn more and more. But I could not find the answers. Among one thousand people, I found one good man. But among them all, I did not find a good woman. I continued to try to learn more and more. But I could not find the answers. Among one thousand people, I found one good man. But among them all, I did not find a good woman. I continued to try to learn more and more. But I could not find the answers. Among one thousand people, I found one good man. But among them all, I did not find a good woman. I continued to try to learn more and more.
korean_text: 내 마음이 계속 찾아 보았으나 아직도 찾지 못한 것이 이것이라 천 사람 가운데서 한 사람을 내가 찾았으나 이 모든 사람들 중에서 여자는 한 사람도 찾지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: I continued to try to learn more and more
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 계속해서 더 많이 배우려고 노력했다

sentences.original_text: But I could not find the answers
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 답을 찾을 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: Among one thousand people
sentences.korean_translation: 천 명 중에서

sentences.original_text: I found one good man
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 한 명의 선한 남자를 찾았다

sentences.original_text: But among them all
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들 모두 중에서

sentences.original_text: I did not find a good woman
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 선한 여자를 찾지 못했다
